infos.value: Hey, now! Don't tell me that the fight's already gone out of you!
Does it hurt? It hurts, doesn't it? Oh, you must be fighting back the tears! Let it all out, aye!
Say naught. You'll just wind them up.
I just wanted your permission is all. Can I kill them? Pleeease?
Oh? You saying you're gonna show us what you're really made of?
Aye, then let's do the same for them, Brother.
Tch! How can there...be so...many of them...
Sorry, lass, but we don't have any interest in the weak.
Once we take care of these two, I'll give you another shot, aye? If you're still breathing, that is!
